name: Dance Fantasy - 3D Dancing Game with Sexy Girls
name_original: Dance Fantasy - 3D Dancing Game with Sexy Girls
description:
Stop finding, Dance Fantasy is the entertainment show you ever want and love!
The game is a unique experience, a special combination of music, dance and adventure. You will immerse yourself into a poetic and marvelous land, explore beautiful landscapes, find and collect ancient treasures while enjoying various hot dances from pretty dancing idols.
What are you waiting for? Step up, turn the music on and move your body.
Features:
- Huge fantasy world with marvelous 3d graphic.
- Hundreds of dance step from popular dancing schools: samba, salsa, waltz, swing, break dance, hip hop, disco, belly, moonwalk, gangnam style, freestyle...
- Sixteen (and more with up-coming updates) gorgeous dancers, each with her own distinctive style and charm.
- Capability of dancing to the beat of your favorite music.
- Very quick and smooth dance move, up to 60 frames per second.

Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Op8iGmx_aF0
